org.openadaptor.core.lifecycle
Interface ILifecycleComponent

All Superinterfaces:
IComponent
All Known Subinterfaces:
IRunnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNodeRunner, LifecycleComponent, ReadNode
public interface ILifecycleComponent
extends IComponent

Represents a component that has State and that must be validated, started and stopped. Most top level class in the framework implement this interface. TYpically Adaptor manages this state and uses the addListener(ILifecycleListener) and waitForState(State) to co-ordinate the lifecycle management.

Author:
perryj
